title: Level 30 with 20 champs but I cannot play ranked.
body: As of typing this I have 20 champions in my roster but I can't play ranked. A few of them are from the free champion rotation so I'm not sure if I need to own 20 or have 20 hoping someone could clarify this for me, thanks in advance.

replies.body: You do need to own 20 champs yourself before you can get into ranked I believe. The weekly free champion rotation does not count towards the number of champions you own.
Thanks for the clarification I was really confused for a bit.

So if my main champ Yasuo is in the free rotation... I won't be able to use him in the ranked games? or does that only affect the actual getting into a ranked game. (i have exact 20 champs)
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}
